Introduction

Heo Chan is a South Korean singer-songwriter under Play M Entertainment. He used to be a member of the boy group VICTON. Chan specializes in Hip Hop and Urban Choreography. He was also considered the mood maker of the group thanks to his 4D Personality.

Chan debuted with Victon on November 9, 2016, with their first mini album "Voice To New World". However, on October 11, 2022, IST Entertainment (formerly Play M) announced his departure from the group due to a DUI incident.
